trans-unit.source: Authentication
trans-unit.target: Authentication

trans-unit.source: Azure API Management REST API Authentication
trans-unit.target: Azure API Management REST API Authentication

trans-unit.source: This topic describes how to create the access token required to make calls into the <token>azure_apimgt_3</token> REST API.
trans-unit.target: This topic describes how to create the access token required to make calls into the <token>azure_apimgt_3</token> REST API.

trans-unit.source: <token>crabout</token> authorization and other prerequisites for accessing the API Management REST API, see the <link xlink:href="1b96aa01-6b6a-4d20-b8f3-ccd1d668b2f9#Prerequisites" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Prerequisites</link> section of the <link xlink:href="1b96aa01-6b6a-4d20-b8f3-ccd1d668b2f9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Azure API Management REST API Reference</link>.
trans-unit.target: <token>crabout</token> authorization and other prerequisites for accessing the API Management REST API, see the <link xlink:href="1b96aa01-6b6a-4d20-b8f3-ccd1d668b2f9#Prerequisites" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Prerequisites</link> section of the <link xlink:href="1b96aa01-6b6a-4d20-b8f3-ccd1d668b2f9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Azure API Management REST API Reference</link>.

trans-unit.source: <token>crabout</token> working with the REST API, see the <externalLink><linkText>API Management .NET REST API Sample</linkText><linkUri>https://github.com/Azure/api-management-samples/tree/master/restApiDemo</linkUri></externalLink> and the <externalLink><linkText>Getting Started with Azure API Management REST API</linkText><linkUri>http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/videos/getting-started-with-azure-api-management-rest-api/</linkUri></externalLink> video.
trans-unit.target: <token>crabout</token> working with the REST API, see the <externalLink><linkText>API Management .NET REST API Sample</linkText><linkUri>https://github.com/Azure/api-management-samples/tree/master/restApiDemo</linkUri></externalLink> and the <externalLink><linkText>Getting Started with Azure API Management REST API</linkText><linkUri>http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/videos/getting-started-with-azure-api-management-rest-api/</linkUri></externalLink> video.

trans-unit.source: To manually create an access token
trans-unit.target: To manually create an access token

trans-unit.source: Sign into the <externalLink><linkText>Azure Management Portal</linkText><linkUri>https://manage.windowsazure.com/</linkUri></externalLink>, navigate to your <token>azure_apimgt_3</token> service instance, and click <ui>Manage</ui> to open the publisher portal.
trans-unit.target: Sign into the <externalLink><linkText>Azure Management Portal</linkText><linkUri>https://manage.windowsazure.com/</linkUri></externalLink>, navigate to your <token>azure_apimgt_3</token> service instance, and click <ui>Manage</ui> to open the publisher portal.

trans-unit.source: Click <ui>Security</ui> in the <ui>API Management</ui> section of the left navigation menu, select the <ui>API Management REST API</ui> tab, and ensure that the <ui>Enable API Management REST API</ui> checkbox is checked.
trans-unit.target: Click <ui>Security</ui> in the <ui>API Management</ui> section of the left navigation menu, select the <ui>API Management REST API</ui> tab, and ensure that the <ui>Enable API Management REST API</ui> checkbox is checked.

trans-unit.source: If the <ui>Enable API Management REST API</ui> checkbox is not checked, calls made to the REST API for that service instance will fail.
trans-unit.target: If the <ui>Enable API Management REST API</ui> checkbox is not checked, calls made to the REST API for that service instance will fail.

trans-unit.source: Specify the expiration date and time for the access token in the <ui>Expiry</ui> text box.
trans-unit.target: Specify the expiration date and time for the access token in the <ui>Expiry</ui> text box.

trans-unit.source: This value must be in the format <codeInline>MM/DD/YYYY H:MM PM|AM</codeInline>.
trans-unit.target: This value must be in the format <codeInline>MM/DD/YYYY H:MM PM|AM</codeInline>.

trans-unit.source: Select either the primary key or secondary key in the <ui>Secret Key</ui> drop-down list.
trans-unit.target: Select either the primary key or secondary key in the <ui>Secret Key</ui> drop-down list.

trans-unit.source: The keys provide equivalent access; two keys are provided to enable flexible key management strategies.
trans-unit.target: The keys provide equivalent access; two keys are provided to enable flexible key management strategies.

trans-unit.source: Click <ui>Generate Token</ui> to create the access token.
trans-unit.target: Click <ui>Generate Token</ui> to create the access token.

trans-unit.source: Copy the full access token and provide it in the <codeInline>Authorization</codeInline> header of every request to the API Management REST API, as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: Copy the full access token and provide it in the <codeInline>Authorization</codeInline> header of every request to the API Management REST API, as shown in the following example.

trans-unit.source: To programmatically create an access token
trans-unit.target: To programmatically create an access token

trans-unit.source: Construct a string-to-sign in the following format, where <codeInline>identifier</codeInline> is the value from the <ui>Identifier</ui> text box in the <ui>Credentials</ui> section of the <ui>Service Management API</ui> tab of <ui>System Settings</ui>, and <codeInline>expiry</codeInline> is the value of the <ui>Expiry</ui> text box in the <ui>Access Token</ui> section.
trans-unit.target: Construct a string-to-sign in the following format, where <codeInline>identifier</codeInline> is the value from the <ui>Identifier</ui> text box in the <ui>Credentials</ui> section of the <ui>Service Management API</ui> tab of <ui>System Settings</ui>, and <codeInline>expiry</codeInline> is the value of the <ui>Expiry</ui> text box in the <ui>Access Token</ui> section.

trans-unit.source: To access the settings described in this step, sign into the API Management publisher portal as described in the previous <link xlink:href="5b13010a-d202-4af5-aabf-7ebc26800b3d#MnauallyCreateToken" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">To manually create an access token</link> section.
trans-unit.target: To access the settings described in this step, sign into the API Management publisher portal as described in the previous <link xlink:href="5b13010a-d202-4af5-aabf-7ebc26800b3d#MnauallyCreateToken" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">To manually create an access token</link> section.

trans-unit.source: Generate a signature by applying an HMAC-SHA512 hash function to the string-to-sign using either the primary or secondary key.
trans-unit.target: Generate a signature by applying an HMAC-SHA512 hash function to the string-to-sign using either the primary or secondary key.

trans-unit.source: Base64 encode the returned signature key.
trans-unit.target: Base64 encode the returned signature key.

trans-unit.source: Create an access token using the following format.
trans-unit.target: Create an access token using the following format.

trans-unit.source: Use these values to create an <codeInline>Authorization</codeInline> header in every request to the API Management REST API, as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: Use these values to create an <codeInline>Authorization</codeInline> header in every request to the API Management REST API, as shown in the following example.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the preceding steps for generating the access token.
trans-unit.target: The following example demonstrates the preceding steps for generating the access token.

trans-unit.source: For complete sample code, see the <externalLink><linkText>API Management .NET REST API Sample</linkText><linkUri>https://github.com/Azure/api-management-samples/tree/master/restApiDemo</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For complete sample code, see the <externalLink><linkText>API Management .NET REST API Sample</linkText><linkUri>https://github.com/Azure/api-management-samples/tree/master/restApiDemo</linkUri></externalLink>.
